data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Schreber, Johann Christian Daniel von (1789): Gomphia Schreb. In: Genera Plantarum Eorumque Characteres Naturales Secundum Numerum, Figuram, Situm, & Proportionem Omnium Fructificationis Partium. (Ed. 8 [a]). Frankfurt am Main: 291-292, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.15067
